empty.title: Empty folder
empty.description: This folder was empty at the time the backup was created. Add the missing files to the folder and create a new backup.

emptySearch.title: No files found
emptySearch.description: No files or folders matched your search query. Try a different query or add the missing files to the folder.

error.title: Failed to stop mount
error.description: The mount might still be in use. Try closing any applications that are using the mount.

restoreDialog.title: Restore Folder
restoreDialog.description: Restore a folder from a backup.

compress.label: Compress ZIP File
compress.description: Reduces the size, but slows down the restore

warning.title: Files might be overwritten
warning.description: The selected folder is not empty. Existing files and folders could potentially be overwritten with the restored files. Consider creating a new empty folder instead.

confirmed.label: I understand that files might be overwritten
